reviewText: We just finished watching this and it was awesome! all of of us couldn't believe our eyes. When it comes to extreme videos, we are pretty hard to please, but this one was amazing because just when you thought it could not get more violent, unbelievable stuff happens.

If you're desirous to view raw, explicit material that is unadulterated than this is the video for you. It has it all, and they save one of the best scenes for last! You'll enjoy watching some of these real fights caught on film.
Amazing. Truly amazing. The footage will shock you. It is hard to believe what happens on America`s streets at night. A must see!
